sentences.english: " Our daughter waved and said, "Good-bye, Minnie .
sentences.chinese: 女兒也揮著手說，“再見了，米妮。”

sentences.english: The manager stormed into my office,waving a piece of paper about.
sentences.chinese: 經理怒氣衝衝闖進我的辦公室，手裏揮着一份文件。

sentences.english: Music education has been playing an important role in the promotion of quality-oriented education.
sentences.chinese: 音樂教育在素質教育中一直髮揮着巨大的作用。

sentences.english: He could hear two men walking around the Upper Library, dusting the bookshelves with fly- whisks .
sentences.chinese: 只聽得兩個人走進書房，揮拂塵四下裏拂拭。

sentences.english: At this time, saw a mantis sword play, to seize a dragonfly.
sentences.chinese: 這時，只見螳螂一個揮馬刀，把蜻蜓抓住了。

sentences.english: We must exploit tactical surprise to the maxima.
sentences.chinese: 我們必鬚髮揮戰術的奇襲效果到極致。

sentences.english: On Wall Street, the ax keeps falling again and again.
sentences.chinese: 在華爾街，裁員的大斧一次又一次的揮下。
船啓航時，湯姆揮了揮手。

sentences.english: Happiness is indelible, sadness is essential not to go.
sentences.chinese: 快樂是抹不掉的，憂傷是揮不去的。

sentences.english: The study of the nature of values and value judgments.
sentences.chinese: 理解在確定備抵價值時判斷髮揮的作用。

sentences.english: The European Union must assert a common position and take the lead on this.
sentences.chinese: 歐盟必須主張共一個立場，併發揮帶頭作用。

sentences.english: He mainly accepts and develops Benedetto Croce's viewpoint to solve this problem.
sentences.chinese: 他主要通過接受併發揮克羅齊的觀點來解決這一問題。

sentences.english: Luo Fu laid a foundation for the Luo Fu Cultural Square together with leaders presented.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫和與會領導一起揮鏟培土，爲洛夫文化廣場奠基。

sentences.english: She waves her wand and makes Cinderellas dress beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她揮了揮魔棒，便把灰姑娘的衣服變得很漂亮了。

sentences.english: She waves her wand and makes Cinderellas dress beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 她揮了揮魔棒，便把灰姑娘的衣服變得很漂亮了。
